metadata.title: PerformancePackage Mirror Mount Bracket + Mirror Wire Cord - Escort 9500iX Redline
description: Professionally mount your Radar Detector yourself, in your garage, with our money saving professional installation bundle. Includes our patented Mirror Mount bracket to securely attach your device to your vehicle's rear view mirror, where it will never fall off and has the best detection range. Also includes our Mirror Wire mesh-loomed power cable, to quickly hardwire your radar detector in minutes!
